attributes.action: school leaving age reduced to 16 from 18
attributes.additional_details: In our citizenship groups we are all looking at campaigns. Ours is to try and reduce the leaving age of education to be 16 and NOT 18. We never got a say in this as young adults and now its about time we do. We want the government to take this into account and listen to us, we have to put up with these changes,they do not.
